See "https://github.com/myFMbutler/myFMApiLibrary-for-JS"
Follow install instructions

//run npm install xmlhttprequest

Add "module.exports = {
    DataApi,
    };" 
    to the end of DataApi.js

    //"const XMLHttpRequest = require('xmlhttprequest').XMLHttpRequest;"
    //to the beginning of DataApi.js


Copy vendor/index.js
